TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpServerChannel extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelWithProperties implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiverHook
Public Class HttpServerChannel Inherits BaseChannelWithProperties Implements IChannel, IChannelReceiver, IChannelReceiverHook
type HttpServerChannel = class inherit BaseChannelWithProperties interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface IChannelReceiverHook

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 HTTP 协议传输消息的服务器信道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the HTTP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道跨越远程处理边界 （例如，应用程序域的计算机） 之间传输消息。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, between computers on application domains). 类将使用 HTTP 协议的消息传输。The class transports messages using the HTTP protocol. .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构使用的通道来传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端发出对远程对象的调用时，调用将被序列化为一条消息是由客户端通道发送和接收的服务器信道。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后，它是反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回的值是由服务器信道传输和接收客户端通道。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要执行其他处理的消息在服务器端，可以指定的实现通过其处理的所有消息都可通过传递。To perform additional processing of messages on the server-side, you can specify an implementation of the through which all messages processed by the are passed. 接受二进制或 SOAP 格式序列化的消息。The accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. 一个对象具有关联的配置属性，可以在设置配置文件中运行时 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过传递集合构造函数）。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅的文档。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象来设置远程处理服务器和其客户端。The following code example shows how to use a object to set up a remoting server and its client. 此示例包含三个部分：The example contains three parts: - 一台服务器A server - 客户端A client - 在服务器和客户端使用的远程对象A remote object used by the server and the client 下面的代码示例显示了服务器。The following code example shows a server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server.cs#20)] 下面的代码示例显示了此服务器的客户端。The following code example shows a client for this server. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/client.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/client.cs#30)] 下面的代码示例显示了使用服务器和客户端的远程对象。The following code example shows the remote object used by the server and the client. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/common.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/common.cs#40)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果不需要接收器功能，设置`sinkProvider`参数`null`。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#12)]

summary.span: 使用给定名称初始化 类的新实例，该实例侦听指定的端口。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given name and that listens on the specified port.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数设置属性使用`name`参数。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果你想要注册多个通道，每个通道必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要请求动态分配可用端口，设置`port`参数设为 0 （零）。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Http.HttpServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#13)]

value.span: 一个对象，其中包含的通道的名称。

span.span: A object that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的信道都有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用时检索特定的信道。This name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给此信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制在所用的通道中数据的显示中顺序实例; 出现之前较低优先级通道的更高优先级通道。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 客户端尝试连接到服务器的渠道中列出的顺序在实例。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 默认优先级为 1;允许使用负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.

abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Should always be for .

summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要调用此方法以开始侦听新初始化通道。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用此方法可重新开始侦听通道后调用方法以停止侦听通道上。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel. 如果您的通道使用动态分配的端口号，则重新开始侦听时，可能会更改端口号。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可停止侦听通道上。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新开始侦听，请使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果您的通道使用动态分配的端口号，则重新开始侦听时，可能会更改端口号。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening.
